Enums.html#/s:7bitcoin10ErrorTypesO.name: ErrorTypes
Enums.html#/s:7bitcoin10ErrorTypesO.abstract: Contains all ErrorTypes of this application, this enum can easily be extended to support more ErrorTypes

Classes/ObjectMapper.html#/s:7bitcoin12O.name: parseTickerData(json:)
Classes/ObjectMapper.html#/s:7bitcoin12O.abstract: Parses tickerData json data to an object of type TickerData

Classes/ObjectMapper.html#/s:7bitcoin12O.name: parseHistoricalData(json:)
Classes/ObjectMapper.html#/s:7bitcoin12O.abstract: Parses historical json data to an object of type HistoricalData

Classes/NetworkHandler.html#/s:7bitcoin1.name: requestJSON(apiPath:apiParameters:success:failure:)
Classes/NetworkHandler.html#/s:7bitcoin1.abstract: Requests json data from a given site

Classes/ApiProxy.html#/s:7bitcoin8ApiPro.name: fetchTickerData(success:failure:)
Classes/ApiProxy.html#/s:7bitcoin8ApiPro.abstract: Fetches the Bitcoin ticker data - More information can be found here: https://apiv2.bitcoinaverage.com/#ticker-data-per-symbol

Classes/ApiProxy.html#/s:7bitcoin8ApiPro.name: fetchHistoricalData(interval:success:failure:)
Classes/ApiProxy.html#/s:7bitcoin8ApiPro.abstract: Fetches the historical Bitcoin data over a certain time period (1 day, 1 month, alltime) - More information can be found here: https://apiv2.bitcoinaverage.com/#historical-data

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.name: resetButtonStates()
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.abstract: Resets all buttons states to the unselected state

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.name: selectButton(button:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.abstract: Marks a button as active and styles the button appropriate

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.name: updateBitcoinPrice()
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.abstract: Fetches and updates the UI with the current Bitcoin price in USD

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.name: drawChart(historicalData:interval:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:7bitcoin1.abstract: Draw historical Bitcoin data on a line chart diagram

Classes/ChartData.html#/s:7bitcoin9Chart.name: setChartDataForInterval(interval:historicalData:)
Classes/ChartData.html#/s:7bitcoin9Chart.abstract: Stores the given historicalData to a local variable

Classes/ChartData.html#/s:7bitcoin9Chart.name: getChartDataForInterval(interval:)
Classes/ChartData.html#/s:7bitcoin9Chart.abstract: Returns the locally stored historicalData from a given time interval

Classes/ChartData.html.name: ChartData
Classes/ChartData.html.abstract: ChartData, stores the data locally to prevent overfetching -> data could be saved later to coreData / Realm to make the app offline capable

Classes/ApiProxy.html.name: ApiProxy
Classes/ApiProxy.html.abstract: Contains all the methods needed in this app to fetch data from the bitcoinaverage.com API

Classes/NetworkHandler.html.name: NetworkHandler
Classes/NetworkHandler.html.abstract: Handles the network connection, the actual request to the API is made here

Classes/ObjectMapper.html.name: ObjectMapper
Classes/ObjectMapper.html.abstract: Converts data to swift objects, it maps the data to objects
